src.chess

Class ChessRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.chess.ChessRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rules

    public class ChessRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rules
    ChessRules implements Rules from src.games and checks the chess rules.
    Author:
    Beg√ºm Tosun, Alexander Posch

      • checkEachPossibleMove

        private static Messages checkEachPossibleMove(GameBoard gameBoard,
                                              java.lang.String move,
                                              java.lang.String mode)
        Checks whether the given move is valid. The method returns Messages.MOVE_ALLOWED or the corresponding error message.
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - GameBoard
        move - String
        mode - String: There are two different modes. When a normal move is checked the mode is "move". When a possible attack is checked the mode is "attack".
        Returns:
        Messages

      • checkPawnMoves

        private static Messages checkPawnMoves(GameBoard gameBoard,
                                       java.lang.String move)
        Checks pawn moves. The method returns Messages.MOVE_ALLOWED or Messages.ERROR_WRONGMOVEMENT_DIRECTION_PAWN.
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - GameBoard
        move - String
        Returns:
        Messages

      • isPromotion

        public static java.lang.String isPromotion(GameBoard gameBoard,
                                           PlayingPiece[][] stateToCheck)
        Checks whether the last move was a promotion. In case of a promotion the method returns a String description of the target field otherwise it returns the String "false".
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - GameBoard
        stateToCheck - PlayingPiece[][]
        Returns:
        String

      • checkKingMoves

        private static Messages checkKingMoves(GameBoard board,
                                       java.lang.String move,
                                       java.lang.String mode)
        Checks whether the given move of the king is valid. If the move is valid the method will return Messages.MOVE_ALLOWED otherwise Messages.ERROR_WRONGMOVEMENT_DIRECTION_KING.
        Parameters:
        board - GameBard
        move - String
        mode - String: If the move which is to be checked is just a normal king move the mode should be "move". If a possible attack from the opponent king is checked then the mode should be "attack".
        Returns:
        Messages

      • isGameFinished

        public static Messages isGameFinished(PlayingPiece[][] stateToCheck,
                                      java.lang.String colour)
        After the execution of a move the method checks if the game is finished. Messages.DEFEATED, Messages.VICTORY, Messages.DRAW and Messages.GO_ON are possible return values.
        Parameters:
        stateToCheck - PlayingPiece[][]
        colour - String: colour of player whose turn it is to move
        Returns:
        Messages
